title: My alarms don't turn off Do not disturb mode
content:
I've looked everywhere for a solution.

Tired to delete/ unuse the dnd templates and create a new one.
Yes, I've tried toggling the "Alarms can override" 
No, my phone wasn't low on battery.

Do not disturb mode is the single worst thing about the pixel 3 and the fact there doesn't seem to be a decent support team for their phones. Very disappointed in Google.
